ads-best-practices

ADS Best Practices

View on GitHub

Methods

  • Use underscore prefix for internal methods of a react component.
// bad
React.createClass({
  onClickSubmit() {
    // do stuff
  }

  // other stuff
});

// good
React.createClass({
  _onClickSubmit() {
    // do stuff
  }

  // other stuff
});
ads-best-practices is maintained by appirio-digital. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
